title: First Ride: The Devinci Hatchet Pro Is The Racey Gravel Bike We Didn’t Expect
content:
While most new gravel bike releases err toward becoming more like a mountain bike, Devinci's made a gravel bike that is purely focused on speed.

Read the full article at First Ride: The Devinci Hatchet Pro Is The Racey Gravel Bike We Didn’t Expect on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
